name: 宝丽娜·格雷茨基
name_full: 宝丽娜·格雷茨基 Paulina Gretzky
birth_place: 美国,加利福尼亚州,洛杉矶

last_movies.title: 全力挥杆：高尔夫大满贯之路 第一季

introduction: Gretzky is the eldest child of Wayne Gretzky and Janet Jones and has four siblings. She is the granddaughter of Walter Gretzky and niece of Keith Gretzky and Brent Gretzky.In August 2013, she became engaged to professional golfer Dustin Johnson after seven months of dating.[6] She gave birth to their son, Tatum Gretzky Johnson, on January 19, 2015.Gretzky decided not to go to college in order to pursue a career in entertainment. She performed in public for the first time at the 2003 Heritage Classic with "I Will Remember You".[8] Her song "Collecting Dust" was on MTV's Laguna Beach: The Real Orange County. It has since been released on iTunes.[9] She made her modeling debut on the August 2005 cover of Flare.[10]Gretzky played "Bikini Girl Daisy" in Grown Ups 2.[11] In 2014, AskMen ranked her #59 on their list of the most desirable women.[12] She was featured on the cover of Golf Digest for the May 2014 issue.
